glsa.title: Wicd: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Wicd may allow for disclosure of sensitive information.

background.p: Wicd is an open source wired and wireless network manager for Linux.

description.p: Tiziano Mueller of Gentoo discovered that the DBus configuration file for Wicd allows arbitrary users to own the org.wicd.daemon object.

impact.p: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to receive messages that were intended for the Wicd daemon, possibly including credentials e.g. for wireless networks.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
